levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 20% of the HP damage dealt (max 100)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Laceration] and +6 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Apply 3 [AttackUp] next turn to all <Bloodfiend> allies
- At 3+ highest Reson, also apply an additional 1 [AttackDmgUp] next turn 
- At 3+ highest A-Reson, apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] instead
[WhenUse] If this unit's [Laceration] Potency is greater than 30, lower [Laceration] Potency on self by (([Laceration] on self) - 30)
[WinDuel] Gain 1 [KeptBlood]
levelList.name: Grovel.

levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 100)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 4 [Laceration] and +7 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Apply 1 [AttackDmgUp] next turn to all <Bloodfiend> allies
- At 3+ highest Reson, apply an additional 1 [Enhancement] next turn
- At 4+ highest A-Reson, apply 2 [Enhancement] instead
[WhenUse] If this unit's [Laceration] Potency is greater than 30, lower [Laceration] Potency on self by (([Laceration] on self) - 30)
[WhenUse] Deal +5% damage for every 3 [Laceration] on self (Max 30%)
[WinDuel] Gain 2 [KeptBlood]
levelList.name: Blood... I Need... Blood

levelList.desc:
This unit's HP does not drop below 1 while using this Skill.
[BeforeAttack] For every 7 [KeptBlood] on self, Atk Weight +1 (Max +2)
[WhenUse] If the target has 10+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 60 [Laceration] and +10 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] At 3+ Highest Reson. Apply 1 [PlusCoinValueUp] next turn to all <Bloodfiend> allies
[WhenUse] If this unit's [Laceration] Potency is greater than 60, lower [Laceration] Potency on self by (([Laceration] on self) - 60)
[WinDuel] Gain 3 [KeptBlood]
levelList.name: The Parade's Prince

levelList.desc:
[WhenUseEvade] Base Power +1 for every [Laceration] Count on the target (max 4)
[StartBattle] Heal 50 HP (Max once per turn)
[SucceedEvade] After successfully evading, use 'Too Much... It's... Too... Much' Skill
levelList.name: Leave Me Alone...!

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If this unit's [Laceration] Potency is greater than 10, lower [Laceration] Potency on self by (([Laceration] on self) - 10)
[WhenUse] Deal +5% damage for every 3 [Laceration] on target (Max 30%)
levelList.name: Too Much... It's... Too... Much
